AT.name: Metroid™: Zero Mission
AT.description: In dieser preisgekrönten Neuauflage des ersten Metroid-Abenteuers schlüpfst du in die Rolle der Kopfgeldjägerin Samus Aran, um den Planeten Zebes zum allerersten Mal zu infiltrieren und schließlich die Weltraumpiraten und das Mother Brain zu besiegen. Aber auf Zebes ist nicht alles so, wie du dich zu erinnern glaubst! Metroid: Zero Mission bietet komplett neu designte Level basierend auf den klassischen Labyrinthen, allerdings mit vielen Erweiterungen, wie zum Beispiel Morph Ball-Werfern und Seilrutschen. Zusätzlich wirst du auf eine Vielzahl neuer Gegner und Bosse treffen. Außerdem wirst du feststellen, dass das Spiel nach dem Sieg über Mother Brain noch lange nicht vorbei ist!

AU.name: Metroid™: Zero Mission
AU.description: In this acclaimed retelling of the original Metroid adventure, step into the boots of bounty hunter Samus Aran as she infiltrates planet Zebes for the first time, to take down the Space Pirates and Mother Brain... but this is not the Zebes that you might remember! Metroid: Zero Mission features completely redesigned environments, based on the original maze-like levels, but enhanced with new features like Morph Ball launchers and zip lines; and it’s crawling with vicious new enemies and bosses. Plus – once you’ve defeated Mother Brain, the mission is far from over!

BG.name: Metroid™: Zero Mission
BG.description: In this acclaimed retelling of the original Metroid adventure, step into the boots of bounty hunter Samus Aran as she infiltrates planet Zebes for the first time, to take down the Space Pirates and Mother Brain... but this is not the Zebes that you might remember! Metroid: Zero Mission features completely redesigned environments, based on the original maze-like levels, but enhanced with new features like Morph Ball launchers and zip lines; and it’s crawling with vicious new enemies and bosses. Plus – once you’ve defeated Mother Brain, the mission is far from over!

BE.name: Metroid™: Zero Mission
BE.description: Dans cette célèbre aventure reprenant l'histoire du Metroid original, incarnez Samus Aran, une chasseuse de primes, et infiltrez la planète Zebes pour tenter d'éliminer les pirates de l'espace et leur chef, Mother Brain... Mais ce n’est pas la planète Zebes que vous avez connue ! Dans Metroid: Zero Mission, découvrez de tout nouveaux décors inspirés des niveaux labyrinthiques du jeu original, et de nouvelles améliorations telles que les propulseurs pour la boule morphing et les tyroliennes, et parcourez une planète peuplée de nouveaux ennemis et boss vicieux... Mais même une fois Mother Brain éliminé, votre mission sera loin d’être terminée !

ES.name: Metroid™: Zero Mission
ES.description: Métete en la piel de la famosa cazarrecompensas Samus Aran y vuelve a infiltrarte en el planeta Zebes para acabar con los piratas espaciales y su líder, Mother Brain. Pronto descubrirás que en esta nueva versión del clásico Metroid, las cosas no son como tú las recordabas... En Metroid: Zero Mission los escenarios de laberintos de siempre han sido reinventados para darles mayor jugabilidad. Ahora están repletos de nuevos y terribles jefes y enemigos y cuentan con novedades como el lanzador de morfoesferas y las tirolinas. Y por si esto fuera poco, ahora derrotar a Mother Brain es solo el principio...

IT.name: Metroid™: Zero Mission
IT.description: Samus Aran è tornata nell'acclamato seguito di Metroid! Segui la cacciatrice di taglie nella sua inedita missione sul pianeta Zebes per sconfiggere i pirati dello spazio e sbarazzarsi di Mother Brain... Ti accorgerai presto che non tutto è come te lo ricordavi! In Metroid: Zero Mission i labirintici scenari di sempre sono stati reiventati e arricchiti di elementi come i propulsori della sfera morfica e nuovi sistemi di trasporto, ma sono sempre brulicanti di nemici e boss! Ah! Anche se sconfiggi Mother Brain, la tua missione non è finita...

Plus – once you’ve defeated Mother Brain, the mission is far from over!

NL.name: Metroid™: Zero Mission
NL.description: In deze geprezen herziende vertelling van het originele Metroid-avontuur treed je in de voetsporen van premiejager Samus Aran terwijl ze de planeet Zebes voor de eerste maal infiltreert op jacht naar ruimtepiraten en Mother Brain. Maar, dit is niet Zebes zoals je het je herinnert. Metroid: Zero Mission biedt opnieuw ontworpen omgevingen gebaseerd op de originele labyrintachtige levels, verbetert met onder andere de aangepaste Morph Ball. Verder maken nieuwe vijanden en bazen de opwachting. Overigens is je avontuur verre van voorbij als je Mother Brain hebt verslagen!

NZ.name: Metroid™: Zero Mission
NZ.description: In this acclaimed retelling of the original Metroid adventure, step into the boots of bounty hunter Samus Aran as she infiltrates planet Zebes for the first time, to take down the Space Pirates and Mother Brain... but this is not the Zebes that you might remember! Metroid: Zero Mission features completely redesigned environments, based on the original maze-like levels, but enhanced with new features like Morph Ball launchers and zip lines; and it’s crawling with vicious new enemies and bosses. Plus – once you’ve defeated Mother Brain, the mission is far from over!

PL.name: Metroid™: Zero Mission
PL.description: In this acclaimed retelling of the original Metroid adventure, step into the boots of bounty hunter Samus Aran as she infiltrates planet Zebes for the first time, to take down the Space Pirates and Mother Brain... but this is not the Zebes that you might remember! Metroid: Zero Mission features completely redesigned environments, based on the original maze-like levels, but enhanced with new features like Morph Ball launchers and zip lines; and it’s crawling with vicious new enemies and bosses. Plus – once you’ve defeated Mother Brain, the mission is far from over!

PT.name: Metroid™: Zero Mission
PT.description: Nesta aclamada aventura, uma versão melhorada do clássico Metroid, assume o papel da famosa caçadora de recompensas, Samus Aran, e infiltra-te pela primeira vez no planeta Zebes para acabar com os Space Pirates e Mother Brain. Mas, este não é exatamente o planeta Zebes que tu conheceste! Em Metroid: Zero Mission, encontras cenários novos inspirados nos níveis labirínticos do jogo original e novas melhorias, tais como, lançadores para a Morph Ball e tirolesas. Para além disso, estão repletos de novos e terríveis bosses inimigos. E ao conseguires derrotar Mother Brain, ainda não podes respirar de alívio! A tua missão está apenas a começar!

RU.name: Metroid™: Zero Mission
RU.description: В этом получившем широкое признание ремейке первой игры серии Metroid бесстрашная охотница за головами Samus Aran рассказывает о своем первом проникновении в темные недра планеты Zebes. Итак, она здесь, чтобы сразиться с космическими пиратами и их предводительницей Mother Brain... Только теперь это совсем не та планета, которую вы помните по первой игре! Metroid: Zero Mission имеет более красочную и живую графику. Оригинальные уровни-лабиринты дополнены новыми предметами, такими как пусковая установка для шара Morph Ball и самый настоящий зип-лайн. Помимо этого, уровни Zero Mission просто кишат злобными врагами и боссами. И, наконец, самое интересное... Итак, вы одержали победу над Mother Brain и думаете, что на этом ваша миссия окончена? Напротив, впереди вас ждет еще множество приключений!

SE.name: Metroid™: Zero Mission
SE.description: In this acclaimed retelling of the original Metroid adventure, step into the boots of bounty hunter Samus Aran as she infiltrates planet Zebes for the first time, to take down the Space Pirates and Mother Brain... but this is not the Zebes that you might remember! Metroid: Zero Mission features completely redesigned environments, based on the original maze-like levels, but enhanced with new features like Morph Ball launchers and zip lines; and it’s crawling with vicious new enemies and bosses. Plus – once you’ve defeated Mother Brain, the mission is far from over!
